High_Point.Guilford Technical Community College:
Guilford Technical Community College (more commonly known as Guilford Tech or "G-Tech," and often shortened to GTCC) is a public community college based in the Piedmont Triad of North Carolina. Guilford Technical Community College also has a campus in Jamestown, North Carolina and High Point, North Carolina.


== History ==
The college was founded as the Guilford Industrial Education Center on April 3, 1958 as a training facility established to prepare workers for technical jobs created by the rapid manufacturing growth in the county.
